named-native-query.name: Select.CommonStudentsForTeachers
named-native-query.query: select s.email from ( select distinct s.id, s.email from Student s inner join StudentTeacher t on s.id = t.studentId inner join Teacher h on t.teacherId = h.id and h.email in (:listTeacher) ) s inner join StudentTeacher t on s.id = t.studentId inner join Teacher h on t.teacherId = h.id and h.email in (:listTeacher) group by s.id having count(*) = :counts ;
